Episodes.Title: Welcome to Briarcliff
Episodes.Plot: Terrifying evils blur the boundaries between reality and insanity at the Briarcliff Manor.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Jenna Dewan-Tatum, Mark Consuelos, Britne Oldford, Joe Egender

Episodes.Title: Tricks and Treats
Episodes.Plot: An exorcist is called to Briarcliff to help save a troubled farm boy; Sister Jude's darkest secret is revealed.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Jenna Dewan-Tatum, Fredric Lehne, Robin Weigert, Jenny Wade

Episodes.Title: Nor'easter
Episodes.Plot: A violent storm allows a group of patients to plan a daring escape; Sister Jude is haunted by her past.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Jenna Dewan-Tatum, Mark Consuelos, Fredric Lehne

Episodes.Title: I Am Anne Frank (1)

Episodes.Title: I Am Anne Frank (2)
Episodes.Plot: Sister Jude employs a renowned Nazi hunter to gather evidence against Arden; Kit makes a surprising confession; Bloody Face is unmasked.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Fredric Lehne, Matthew John Armstrong, Franka Potente, Valorie Hubbard

Episodes.Title: The Origins of Monstrosity
Episodes.Plot: A mysterious little girl is abandoned at Briarcliff; the Monsignor makes a Faustian pact with Dr. Arden; the origin of Bloody Face is revealed.

Episodes.GuestStars: Mark Consuelos, Bob Bancroft, Kirk Bovill, Nikki Hahn, Tara Holt, Kasey Mahaffy

Episodes.Title: Dark Cousin
Episodes.Plot: Sister Mary Eunice is terrified to discover a dark angel at Briarcliff; Kit makes a bold move to be reunited with Grace.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Frances Conroy, Fredric Lehne, William Mapother, Erin Allin O'Reilly, Sean Patrick Thomas

Episodes.Title: Unholy Night
Episodes.Plot: A murderous Santa wreaks havoc on Briarcliff; Sister Jude faces off with the devil; Arden has a shocking encounter in the death chute.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Lara Harris, David Hutchison, Cole Sand, Ian McShane, Jennifer Holland

Episodes.Title: The Coat Hanger
Episodes.Plot: The Monsignor takes an unlikely convert under his wing; Lana secures a new piece of evidence that can exonerate Kit; Dr. Arden witnesses a miraculous return.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Naomi Grossman, Fredric Lehne, Ian McShane, Rebecca Metz

Episodes.Title: The Name Game
Episodes.Plot: The Monsignor confronts the Devil. Dr. Arden?s experiments reach a shocking conclusion. Dr. Thredson facilitates a surprising reunion for Kit.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language

Episodes.Title: Spilt Milk
Episodes.Plot: Grace tells Kit devastating news about the aliens' experiments on Alma; Dr. Thredson receives an unexpected visitor; the Monsignor goes to extreme lengths to silence Jude.

Episodes.Title: Continuum
Episodes.Plot: A deadly new inmate threatens Sister Jude's chance of release; Grace's obsession with the aliens turns violent.

Episodes.Title: Madness Ends
Episodes.Plot: Johnny sets out to complete his father's work; Lana leads the charge to finally shut down Briarcliff.
